item.title: Dynamic Wordclouds with Wordcloud2
item.description: Introduction Wordclouds are great tools to quickly see the words used in a piece of text, but they can get boring to look at. In this post, we introduce a new R package called wordcloud2. This package will dynamically plot the wordcloud on screen, add hoverability to each word, and be able to form the wordcloud into different shapes. Getting our Data Once again, we will use the text from Bram Stoker’s “Dracula”.
